name: Ship Warfare - Nokia 3310 jam submission
description:
You are a pilot, searching to survive in the far of the space.  You can move using WS and shoot by pressing SPACE. If you press escape, you can see the upgrade tab to upgrade your stats: energy will recover your health , damage will allow you to one shot every enemy, speed will make you faster. 

Version 1.0.1 leaderboards

se_bf - 1408
